name: user-management-service
description: A simple user management service for demonstration purposes

scripts.build: echo 'Building application...' && mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/* dist/
scripts.publish:artifactory: npm pack && echo 'Package created. Configure your artifactory registry with: npm config set registry <your-artifactory-url> or via jfrog cli' && echo 'Then run: npm publish'

author: Interview Candidate
